channel.title: LunarRising *Need Staff* *317* *New RSPS*
channel.description:
[center]Hello. I'm Pluto from LunarRising. I'm reposting my server advertisement and actually putting time into it this time. I would love to keep this brief but I guess people like the media and see some of the stuff. Keep in mind some of our features aren't shown. We want to keep some suprises. I will incluge img tags with the photos to make it easier this time. Please enjoy the server P.S. Please Note We Are Still IN BETA! :)[/center]
-Spawn NPC's- [img]http://i.imgur.com/l4EubhF.png[/img]
-Custom Spawn- [img]http://i.imgur.com/Ht6pcfS.png[/img]
-Customs!- [img]http://i.imgur.com/OzbtPFK.png[/img]
-Working Key Chest- [img]http://i.imgur.com/QA7T2ss.png[/img]
-Nex With Torva!-
[img]http://i.imgur.com/aaCfmwK.png[/img]
and Much MORE!
Eager to play? Here's the DL Link - [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/3jvec6v33ohn7yl/LunarRising.jar?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/s/3jvec6v33ohn7yl/LunarRising.jar?dl=0[/url]
Hope to See You Online!

item.title: LunarRising *Need Staff* *317* *New RSPS*

item.description:
@hxze wrote:

Client doesn’t even work for me, creates 6 null files on my Desktop, since I’m on a Mac. I can play other servers fine so no, it’s nothing wrong with my pc or OS lol.
